entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question about UseIntellisenseDocumentationFile #70315
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http double check #70314
  • Potential breaking change in socket close behavior in net6 over net5 on Linux #70311
  • Assert failure: !PreemptiveGCDisabled() #70307
  • Assertion failures in merged tests don't get surfaced in AzDO #70306
  • methodical_others test failing/timing out on multiple runtimes, multiple OSes #70305
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: function signature mismatch` in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` - AOT/v8 #70304
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: function signature mismatch` in `System.Linq.Tests` - AOT/Linux/v8 #70303
  • .NET 7 Preview 6, AOT Compilation fails on Android #70302
  • Test failure: Interop/PInvoke/SetLastError/SetLastErrorTest/SetLastErrorTest.sh #70296
  • Test failure: Loader\classloader\SequentialLayout\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential.cmd #70295
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: !LongFile::IsPathNotFullyQualified(path) || !LongFile::ContainsDirectorySeparator(path) #70293
    7.0.0
  • Aes.Create returns null #70290
  • Consider soft-reserving a register for "zero" on x64 #70287
    Future
  • Inconsistent results working with Tasks in AOT-Published Blazor.WebAssembly builds #70286
  • [wasm][debugger] Previous frames on call stack have different line location on Firefox and Chrome #70281
  • Mono: `BadImageFormatException: Method has no body` on tailcall to open delegate bound to interface method #70279
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException when a blazor component parameter is a specific struct layout #70289
  • Improve static library publishing on Unix #70277
  • [API Proposal]: GC_VersionInfo2 #70276
  • Reconsider the exception type thrown when trying to open a directory as file #70275
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.FijiTimeZoneTest #70274
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/interactions/gcincatch_ro/gcincatch_ro.cmd #70272
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #70270

Closed

  • ARM64 - GT_MADD - do not emit 'msub' in code-gen #67869
    7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] SSL and authentication failures affecting branch CI #67947
  • [ServiceProvider] Services registered as open generic are overwritten by closed generic registrations when ValidateOnBuild is on #70140
  • System.Net.Http recommended fix #70312
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfConcat #70273
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateExpressionsWithElementAccessByLocalVariable Failed #70310
  • build-native.sh doesn't update the shared testhost #70134
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] ILLinker throws InvalidOperationException #70031
  • Assertion failed '!foundDiff' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #69659
    7.0.0
  • Compiled regex hangs and finally fails for stack-intensive regex pattern #69381
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `function signature mismatch` in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` #70298
  • [wasm][aot] `function signature mismatch` in `system.linq.tests` #70301
  • [wasm][aot] `function signature mismatch` in `system.linq.tests` #70300
  • Blazor wasm HttpClient ignores spaces at the end of URIs even if it is escaped (%20) #70025
  • Sha1_Rfc3174_3 test failure in wasm #70291
  • JsonNode serialize should respect naming policy #70129
  • Blazor WASM JSArrayBufferData exceeds 500MB memory launching through IIS - (Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. RangeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory) #63921
    7.0.0
  • Introduce DbDataSource abstraction to System.Data #64812
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/11/2022 9:09:01 PM #69444
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests Timeout #58643
    7.0.0
  • Redirected console colour not working #70278
  • [Bug] SSL Connection refused when calling ASP.NET Core API endpoints from .NET MAUI App on Android #62966
    6.0.MAUI
  • RyuJIT generates redundant code when inlining string.IsNullOrEmpty #4207
    Future
  • Potential infinite loop on MacOS on connected sockets #63291
    7.0.0
  • Symbol stripping in NativeAOT to reduce binary size #69847
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on Windows #70316
  • Rename TarFormat to TarEntryFormat #70313
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix TZ Tests #70309
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check for ldobj. #70308
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #70299
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Updating usages of `IntPtr`/`UIntPtr` to be the language keyword `nint`/`nuint` now that they are equivalent #70297
    area-Meta
  • Enable WASM EH as an experiment. #70292
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70288
    Servicing-consider
  • CMake support in VS open folder for coreclr #70285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fixing the costing of GT_CNS_DBL and GT_CNS_VEC instructions #70215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop unnecessary exceptions from being thrown from crossgen when a reference is not actually a managed dll #70191
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move HostAbortedException to Abstractions #70205
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Extend mono AOT compiler to ingest .mibc profiles #70194
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update libraries' building docs for native components #70284
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix lazy loop backtracking uncapture in compiled regexes #70280
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    breaking-change, area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Improve binaries filtering for PMI runs of SPMI collection #70294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Properly handle trailing whitespace in the URL for the HttpClient #70154
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove unused stackwalk-related code #70282
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Decouple TimeOnlyConverter from TimeSpanConverter #70035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fold System.Private.Reflection.Metadata into Corelib #70241
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delete ENABLE_REFLECTION_TRACE #70244
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add list of pre-requisities for Alpine #70283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70149
    area-CoreLib-mono, os-ios
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not rely on `GT_ADDR` in `gtFoldBoxNullable` #69961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for symbol stripping #70233
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • limit retries of EPROTOTYPE on macOS #69882
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Ignoring test for NativeAOT since GetCallingAssembly is unsupported #70221
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-disable `Runtime_56953` #70258
    7.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification, 8.0.0
  • Always use portable tailcalling mechanism for delegate tailcalls #70269
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update shared code from linker #70204
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Revert the gc_pin optimization changes. #70234
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unpin locals #70264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking inner matching loop optimizations #70217
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add legs to build wasm with internal threads only and full threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging wbt failures on windows #70174
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable the pause intrinsic test for x86/x64 CoreCLR #70230
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Feature/add event to minmax threads config #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix linker ref param warnings #70082
    area-Meta
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • handle SECURITY_STATUS 0x80090016 #69942
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Investigate helix error return #70238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #69956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Include `include` folder in runtime pack on all Mono platforms #69719
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't explicitly link ICU into Mono on FreeBSD #70088
    area-Build-mono
  • Add a build lane for FreeBSD Mono. #69715
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not retype SIMD nodes #70265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect none_no value when NUMA node is undefined in distribute_other_procs #69082
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NO MERGE] Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
